attributes.action: reinstate the Yeovil Junction to Yeovil Town railway line.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yeovil is currently served by 2 rail lines however neither are near to the town centre. Yeovil Junction station is 2 miles from the town centre this is very inconvienient for passengers who once had a connecting train service to the town which was abolished about 30 years ago. I/We call to reinstate the railway to encourage the use of public transport, increase connections and provide sufficient capacity during a time of high growth in rail patronage
